thread.title: Nike’s Air Max LD Is the Perfect Combo of Sneaker Tech and Grown-Up Luxe
thread.title_full: Nike’s Air Max LD Is the Perfect Combo of Sneaker Tech and Grown-Up Luxe

author: Lia McGarrigle
title: Nike’s Air Max LD Is the Perfect Combo of Sneaker Tech and Grown-Up Luxe
text:
Visit the original post to see all 5 images from this gallery. 
Brand: Nike
Model: Air Max LD-Zero
Key Features: In a grey-toned suede, leather, and mesh mix, the Air Max LD-Zero combines the upper material of the 1970s LD-1000 with an innovative 360 Air Max sole.
Release Date: March 26
Price: $194
Availability: Nike.com 
Editor’s Notes: When something is designed by streetwear legend Hiroshi Fujiwara, you know it’s worth checking out. For the Air Max LD-Zero, Fujiwara — who is also 1/3 of Nike’s HTM design collective— brought together the perfect combination of innovative sneaker technology and grown-up materials.
In other sneaker news, here are 10 of the best adidas boost sneakers out now and where to buy them.
